entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,472Chapters: 49/75Kudos: 43

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Brutal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,741Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Amidst the forest bathed in the unparalleled light of the full moon, rain, blood, and mud intertwine with the fate of Stiles Stilinski, a young man on the brink of collapse between the genuine love of Derek Hale and the murderous violence of his ex, Theo Raeken. In the wake of pain, transformation, and buried secrets, Theo awakens to something he doesn't yet understand, but which consumes him from the inside out. Rage, instinct, memory, and fear drag him deeper into his obsession—which, in truth, had never left his mind. Meanwhile, Derek and Stiles try to resume a daily life that seems only possible through sarcasm, sharp jokes, and stolen kisses. But, unfortunately, Beacon Hills never forgets. And behind the tenderness lie wounds too deep, unconfessed sins, and a threat that breathes hungrily behind its shadows. This is an intense, overwhelming, and resilient novel. Where we talk about love in times of total darkness, about monsters that live inside and outside the skin, and about what remains of us when we are forced to survive, between brutality and kindness.

entry.title: fucked around and found out
entry.summary:
Author: Sterektrashbag (vannybees)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,522Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: Two truckers come out of the diner laughing loudly and make their way to the building housing the bathrooms.That’s when Stiles gets out of his jeep, ducks his head and makes his way to the same building on quick feet.A dark suspicion slithers into his mind and Derek sniffs the air seeking Stiles on the wind as Stiles disappears into the building’s door, after the truckers.What he smells freezes him to his core, it confirms his dark suspicion and makes Derek’s brain malfunction for a few seconds.Stiles is aroused. He smells of lust and excitement with a hint of shame. Derek knows exactly what Stiles is doing here and his brain jumpstarts and in the next second he’s sprinting across the street getting honked at by a car passing by and continues running until he’s nearly pulling the building’s door off its hinges in his haste to get inside of it, blood boiling in his veins.

entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,112Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 63

Summary: It’s the end of the war and to Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski, it feels as if everyone is celebrating except for him. Perhaps it is the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time and musket balls. Or perhaps it is the doubt he harbours in his heart that he can truly be good at anything but soldiering.Regardless, he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worthy of the name and listening while the locals sing their songs and toast to fallen soldiers. He doesn't think about the men lost from his own rifle regiment, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale of Triskele, last seen leaping into battle with typical reckless heroism. Because even if he had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. They were from two different worlds.

entry.title: Iris (I Just Want You To Know Who I Am)
entry.summary:
Author: PlutoandMars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,778Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 114

Summary: Stiles had made many decisions in his life. Good and bad and horrendously bad. Mexico had been bad. He had made the wrong choice, had had to live with the consequences until he graduated, until he could run from Beacon Hills and not look back.He had known at some point that the call would come, he knew at some point he would return, thrust into another life or death situation with odds stacked against them, confronted by his past and the one person he had desperately tried to forget.Derek had left Beacon Hills on a revenge mission, so sure he wouldn’t return until he had killed Kate. He had thought he was invincible, that finally, he could lure her away from Scott, from his pack, from Stiles. He had thought he could protect him. Six years have gone by and Derek is back in Beacon Hills. The circumstances have changed.Things become dire, Stiles comes back and Derek hasn’t seen Stiles in years. They haven’t spoken about all the unspoken things they definitely should've spoken about. Time has passed, made a delicate distance between them that feels like, with one wrong move, it could rip everything apart.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 376

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,574Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 124,963Chapters: 35/37Kudos: 42

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.
